data.title: Top Things To Do With Kids In August
data.text:
There are only a couple weeks left of summer and we are ready to make the most of every sunny, warm weather day that we have left! Here are the top family activities you’ll want to do this month.

Make A Splash

Cool down and have fun at a water park, beach, or splash pad while you still can – here’s a complete list. If you want our top picks, here they are:

Splash Pad: Jessica’s Splash Pad (Novi)

Waterpark: Wayne County Aquatic Center (Detroit)

Beach: Lake St. Clair Metropark (Harrison Township)

Celebrate Sunflower Season

Get the perfect family photo, sweet treats and a fun family trip. It’s Sunflower Season and you don’t want to miss it! Here are local u-pick farms and sunflower festivities in metro Detroit.

Find A Touch A Truck Event

It doesn’t make much to make kids smile – just some big trucks and cool cars to climb in.

Friday, August 2nd: Big Rig Gig @ Friendship Park (Orion Township)

Saturday, August 3rd: Meet The Fleet @ Township Hall (Waterford)

Sunday, August 4th: Troy Traffic Jam @ Columbia Center (Troy)

Tuesday, August 6th: Library (St. Clair Shores)

Saturday, August 10th: Touch-A-Truck @ Mt.Brighton (Brighton)

Saturday, August 10th: Tons of Trucks @ Clintonwood Park (Clarkston)

Friday, August 16th: Emergency Vehicle Show @ Downtown Ferndale

Saturday, August 24th: Touch-A-Truck @ Greenmead Historic Village (Livonia)

Saturday, August 24th: Tons O’Trucks @ Lenox Township Office (New Haven)

FREE Family Fun

We love FREE! Here are some events you’ll want to check out in August:

ReMix Detroit (Thursdays – Sundays)

Reading & Rhythm On The Riverfront (Thursdays & Fridays)

Campus Kids Days @ Campus Martius (August 18th)

Teachers get FREE Admission to LEGOLAND Discovery Center and SEA LIFE Michigan

The YMCA of Metro Detroit is offering FREE admission this summer. Visit one of seven Metro Detroit locations for FREE, complete this form and enjoy the wellness center, fitness classes, indoor pools and even the child watch!

Special Events & Exhibits

These special events and exhibits won’t last long, enjoy them while you can.

Gabby’s Dollhouse ‘Party With Marty The Party Car’ Tour (Taylor & Novi)

A Day Out With Thomas @ Crossroads Village (Flint)

Dinosauria @ Detroit Zoo (Royal Oak)

Dinosaurs In Motion @ The Henry Ford (Dearborn)

Emotions at Play with Pixar’s Inside Out @ Grand Rapids Children’s Museum (Grand Rapids)

Last Minute Vacations

If you’re looking for a day trip or overnight stay, here are fun, easy, kid-friendly destinations for Michigan families.

Grand Rapids

Midland

Port Huron

Saugatuck

Toledo

Traverse City

Find a Festival or Fair

Dearborn Homecoming, Milford Memories, Arts, Beats & Eats, the Renaissance Festival and more! Check out the list of Festivals and Fairs to visit before school starts.

Watch A Movie Under The Stars

The outdoor summer movie line-up is getting longer. Stay up past bedtime and watch a classic from the car or under the stars.

Sign up for the LittleGuide Detroit newsletter to keep up on events and activities to do this summer!
